name: European Advanced Nanomaterials Congress
content: The European Advanced Nanomaterials Congress (EuNano 2020) is intended to provide an opportunity to promote intensive discussions and collaborations among participants to enhance and widen the knowledge of Advanced Materials Research. The 36th Assembly of AMC will offer coordination of Advanced Nanomaterials, Global Graphene Forum & Advanced Energy Materials and Technology contemporary research fields to pave the way for multi-inter-trans-disciplinary translational research and innovations for the market. Call for Abstracts IAAM invites research professionals, scientific communities, delegates and research students from all over the world to attend the three-day international conference to be held in Stockholm, Sweden during 27 - 29 October 2020.
